rules_text: When this creature enters, mill three cards, then you may cache an instant, sorcery, or Subroutine card from your graveyard. The next activated ability of a Memory you activate this turn costs {2} less to activate. [i](To cache a card, exile it and create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
